mapper.select: select c.*,u.name as userName,u.avatar as userAvatar from biz_user u,biz_comment c where u.id=c.user_id and c.id=#{id}
SELECT AVG(bc.score) FROM biz_comment bc JOIN biz_order bo ON bc.order_id = bo.id JOIN biz_ticket bt ON bo.ticket_id = bt.id WHERE bt.spot_id = #{spotId};
SELECT COUNT(bc.id) FROM biz_comment bc JOIN biz_order bo ON bc.order_id = bo.id JOIN biz_ticket bt ON bo.ticket_id = bt.id WHERE bt.spot_id = #{spotId};
